column1: A funeral service will be held at 2:00 PM Monday
column2: June 22 at Long Hill Baptist Church conducted by Rev. Mark Forrest and Rev. Gene Thomas. Burial will follow in Candor Town Cemetery.  The family will see friends from 6:00 to 8:00 PM Sunday at Briggs-Candor Funeral Home and other times will be at the residence on Blake Street.
